citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process from 2:30pm to
3:00pm on 03/27/2014. Inspectors knocked on the facility door (no answer) and left a message on the licensee's
phone number.
Additional Inspectors
Moore Chad, Animal Care Inspector

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process from 2:30pm to
3:00pm on 03/27/2014.  Inspectors knocked on the facility door (no answer) and left a message on the licensee's
phone number.
Additional Inspectors
Moore Chad, Animal Care Inspector
